lender.name: Julius & Hannah's Family
lender.loan_because: we like the idea of contributing for concrete projects in order to enable people's self-help
lender.occupational_info: teaching and calculating reserves for a reinsurance company

lender.name: L.& B.
lender.loan_because: We like others smiling as we do!

lender.name: Ming
lender.loan_because: it is my way of giving back to the society and helping those who are less privileged than me.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the service performance data of IT suppliers for my company.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I love to help when I can and feel that Kiva gives helps directly to those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and inventor.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: People need help. Its incredible when you can get help from somebody.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Fabiana
lender.whereabouts: Campo Grande Mato Grosso do Sul
lender.loan_because: Amo trabalhar em farmacia de manipulação!!! Preciso de recursos para isso preciso de recursos que nao disponho no momento.Preciso Investir.
lender.occupational_info: Trabalho com manipulação de medicamentos de segunda a sábado sem descanço.

lender.name: Louie
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I believe you always are where you are supposed to be learning what you need to know. I'd like to be there to help out.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find places to call home. If you have a roof over your head, and the basics covered, you are able to pay it forward to help others.

lender.name: barbara
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with the opportunity to be able to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Was an elem teacher, after school director, wheat weaver, apt manager; now retired and a mother, grandmother, wife.

lender.name: Bernie
lender.loan_because: i think micro-finance works and i care
lender.occupational_info: i treat patients with medical emergencies

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: gerard
lender.loan_because: I believe everybody should be given chances in life

lender.name: Sojourner
lender.loan_because: I really enjoy helping people. I am a divorced mom that was left with 7 children to care for so my heart really goes out to the single mom with children.
lender.occupational_info: I will always try to do work helping people. I have had to struggle myself so I know how hard life can be. I don't have a lot but I want to share what I do have.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: Group of friends who give loans rather than gifts. We have more than we need and have decided to give to others, rather to ourselves.

lender.name: Ron & Khris
lender.loan_because: We understand the importance of a loan for small business start up and expansion. Small businesses help stimulate and support the economy.
lender.occupational_info: We provide a custom cake decorating service.

lender.name: Vickie
lender.occupation: Mom, Volunteer Res. Mission in Florida

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: We all need help sometimes. I only wish I could give much more.
lender.occupational_info: I work hard, and am prideful and passionate about what I do. My life is fast-paced, and sometimes all I want to do is stop and enjoy some of the many things that fly right by me. I've always wanted to give more than I have, which is a bittersweet attribute.

lender.name: Pekka
lender.occupational_info: Medical doctor at Pharmaceutical company, Finland

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: It's one small way to make the world a better place by empowering others to create a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I offer a combination of training and advice to help companies sell their products and services more effectively

lender.name: Aven Christian
lender.loan_because: I want make a difference in someone else life even in a smallest way possible

lender.name: DAVID
lender.loan_because: I want the "little guys" to get some opportunities to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I manage and direct people as the build buildings. This includes all the trades and professionals.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I feel good when helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in International Trade.

lender.name: Joan
lender.occupational_info: I am married with two children. i deliver car parts 4 afternoons a week. i love to work in my garden and sew.

lender.name: Chip
lender.loan_because: Lots of people have helped me along the way when I needed it too.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a large university in the Midwestern U.S. and do research in cross-cultural psychology.

lender.name: Tony & Jen
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an air ambulance helicopter pilot. Jen works in hospital administration, sales department. We get to meet for lunch once in a while.

lender.name: Pekoe
lender.loan_because: It's Important

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I have travelled in many parts of the world and found that most people have the same dreams and aspirations for their families as I have for mine. Loaning is a way to assist people who are making a positive contribution to their communities and to their families.
lender.occupational_info: Our company rents farmland to farmers.

lender.name: Amelia
lender.loan_because: I appreciate that Kiva makes it so easy to offer assistance to another person living on the other side of the world. Through Kiva, I feel connected to others in a very positive way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, sitting in front of a computer and keeping things organized. But my passion is singing and performing in plays.

lender.name: FFH&S
lender.occupational_info: Films for the Humanities and Sciences produces and distributes educational media to middle schools, high schools and universities.

lender.name: The Papazoglou Family
lender.loan_because: it is a great thing to help other people.

lender.name: Schark
lender.loan_because: These people are trying to better their lives.

lender.name: Leif and Vikki
lender.loan_because: We loan because God has called us to be a blessing to others, because it's better to teach a man to fish than to give him a fish, because once upon a time a very dear friend loaned to us to start our business and we're ever so grateful.
lender.occupational_info: We own a small tennis court and running track repair business. Leif is also a Fire investigator.

lender.name: Ramir
lender.occupational_info:
I work with computers for some time. This year I decided to start my own business as a webmaster.
All my knowledge I have acquired through computer books, and some Internet courses.
I believe that with dedication I'll have success in my business.

lender.name: 4 Kaps
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you wish to see in the world." ... M.K. Gandhi

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I've been very blessed and I want to share and help people around the world.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I think that we live in a world with enough for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I teach langauges.

lender.name: Melinda & Jeff
lender.loan_because: it makes us feel good

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of a hand up rather than a handout and I truly value the partnership.
lender.occupational_info: My work is being in action, providing value and usefulness to others and their families no matter what I may be doing for work .

lender.name: Victor
lender.loan_because: I think that people need to take action to help themselves. These people are doing that in order to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get mortgages for homes in Canada. Homes are where life begins and provide safety, comfort and happiness for us. Most people take this forgranted. I help people get the best interest rate for a mortgage for their home.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I believe in the motivation and enthusiasm in human beings to determine their own destiny.
lender.occupational_info: I help others by educating patients about their medications and about making their lives healthier.

lender.name: John & Sandy
lender.loan_because: We were given a G.C. for Kiva, what a wonderful gift & opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: Giving is such a wonderful feeling!

lender.name: mary
lender.loan_because: My Father is a huge supporter of Kiva. He gave me a gift certificate for Christmas and I think it was one of the most meaningful presents I have ever received. I am very thankful to be a supporter of Kiva now!

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I love to travel, esp third world countries. I want to help people that are trying to help themselves. Sometimes we all need a little bit of help. I want the world to know not all Americans are focused on themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I currently volunteer for community organizations as I have older family members that I need to take care of ; my children are 23 &24 and do not need Mom to take care of them at this time.

lender.name: Isabelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get a proper income and show them I care about them.

lender.name: Roberto
lender.loan_because: There is a need in this world for people to care a little. Does not matter at what time in life you realized that. Glad to.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a state of the art stage coach throught out the US. Specially the east coast. I meet a lot of people from all walks of life and I love it.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want others to be able to have a chance to make a living and see their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I make signs and brochures to help businesses promote themselves and what they are selling.

lender.name: orval
lender.loan_because: I like to help , makes me feel good too..

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: This Experience is a gift, and I would like to see more microlending become a part of all cultures.
lender.occupational_info: I try an live as naturally as I can; I have goats and chickens and love my garden. For income I take care of other peoples land, work on the river utilizing boating & outdoor education skills.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others start successful businesses
lender.occupational_info: my twin sister and I own a children's record label and publishing company

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I like to help others who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help others to save their money for their future.

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: We all have a responsibility to help support our fellow neighbors. Although, I am not able to help a great deal -- I like micro lending because in a small way I can help someone deserving. Teach a man to fish and feed him for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I draw, paint and take pictures for those who like my work.

lender.name: Garcia
lender.loan_because: It's my way of apologizing for the u.s.' negative impact on large parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: meaningless

lender.name: Fritz and Kristen
lender.loan_because: We have been helped by others to achieve our goals. Now, we have the opportunity to assist someone else achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor for people with kidney problems.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I believe in "paying it forward" and to repay those who took a chance on me.
lender.occupational_info: Challenging and Fulfilling.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: "We can do no great things only small things with great love" Mother Teresa
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell commodities on the NYMEX

lender.name: David Mazurchi
lender.loan_because: It's good, simple, fair, and I can.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: Being a self employed small business owner, I am glad to help other people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I own a mini donut machine and sell during the outdoor market season from May - October.

lender.name: Finn
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a bit more fair...
lender.occupational_info: I advise governments on how they can develop a strategy for improving the situation for young people in their country.

lender.name: Patti & Robert Aguero
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great opportunity for people to make their dreams a reality!
lender.occupational_info: Housewife and grandmother of two small kids. My husband works out of our home as a private investigator mainly doing work for attorneys.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: You are AMAZING people! You INSPIRE me. I'm really grateful that Kiva gives me an opportunity to participate as you build your dream.
lender.occupational_info: I love to make up songs to sing, play and make you laugh.

lender.name: Deirdre
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kerey
lender.loan_because: every action has a reaction
lender.occupational_info: build and maintain the facilities that produce oil / natural gas.

lender.name: Human Rights Task Force
lender.occupational_info: We are the Croton-Harmon High School Human RIghts Task/Action Force. We're a school club dedicated to social action!

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I was lucky to grow up in a environment where I did not have to worry about my family's basic needs. I feel I owe others the opportunity to take care of themselves and their families.

lender.name: MarBro Consulting
lender.loan_because: "Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything." George Bernard Shaw

lender.name: Dani
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are willing to work for a living.
lender.occupational_info: I own a restaurant.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to live in a country that enables me to own and operate a small business. We receive help from so many sources...it's nice to be able to help others for a change.

lender.name: NKU CEO
lender.loan_because: We want to support and encourage the entrepreneurial spirit wherever it exists. We also want to learn from the ventures of successful entrepreneurs while, hopefully, contributing to their success.
lender.occupational_info: NKU CEO is a student organization at Northern Kentucky University. It is a branch of CEO, the Collegiate Entrepreneurs’ Organization, and is the premier global entrepreneurship network which serves over 30,000 students at colleges and universities. It's mission is to inform, support, and inspire college students to be entrepreneurial and seek opportunity through enterprise creation.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: Together we can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I keep house for myself and my husband. I garden flowers and herbs.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: I believed peoples need a second chance....

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: starting a business is hard work. Everyone needs a little help now and then!
lender.occupational_info: I assist brides & grooms achieve their dream wedding. It's the most rewarding job.

lender.name: GPrep History Class
lender.loan_because: We're a global community.

lender.name: WWEF
lender.loan_because: Success starts with believing in Your Dream... Taking the First Step to Achieve It Takes Courage.
lender.occupational_info: I believe in "Helping Others Who Want to Help Themselves Realize Their Dreams".

lender.name: Kendall
lender.loan_because: Even when I've been burned I still have faith in others. I like to help people that need a helping hand. When I've was down and out people helped me out. A good friend says that I'm a good person, and would give my last dollar to someone that needed it more than I. I have faith in others.
lender.occupational_info: I love dogs, especially my Black Lab and my Harlequin Great Dane. I enjoy anything that can be done outdoors.

lender.name: HRSentry
lender.loan_because: We believe in making a difference not only in our local community, but in the community of all people around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: We are an online service that makes over 9,000 resources available to the user that is responsible for the administration of Human Resources. WWW.hrsentry.com

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a little help, now and then, to get over a barrier. People have helped me, and now I can help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now, and am fortunate to have some savings and a pension. Not everyone is so lucky.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: studying

lender.name: Anthonie
lender.loan_because: To honor my new grandson Finn. His birth reminded me of just how lucky we are to be Americans, regardless of how our government shames us to the rest of the world.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: What work?

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: dunna know...I don't do much in terms of charity work but I like the idea of helping people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make stuff pretty.

lender.name: Just Shoot Us
lender.loan_because: We are also a group of working women, who work to provide food, healthcare and education for our children, many of us thanks to loans that we have recieved. We would like to help provide the same opportunities to our "sisters" across the world!

lender.name: veronique
lender.loan_because: I would like to help bring beauty and happiness into to lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: Original Paintings, Illustrations, Art Prints and Paper Goods.I hope to bring Joy, Art and Beauty to your everyday life. I am a force of life avec une joie de vivre.

lender.name: matt
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work for Arizona State University Recycling

lender.name: Jim and Karyn
lender.loan_because: We want to feel that we're having a direct impact on someone's life. Kiva helps us do that.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur who someone took a chance on. I believe capitalism is the best system to spur innovation, improve living standards and promote peaceful exchange.
lender.occupational_info: Online retail of sporting goods

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be in a position where I am able to help others. There isn't much that could be more rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I work to try and help others to have better health.

lender.name: Renata
lender.loan_because: We are all connected and can only succeed together to feel really happy and accomplished
lender.occupational_info: Pilates helps people concentrate and to feel better mentally and physically and while teaching I'm always learning

lender.name: Cornelia & Matt
lender.loan_because: It's important to share when we have so much. And the entrepreneurs are so inspirational! I am so happy when a loan is repaid and we get a message about what you have done with the money. Congratulations to all our entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: We have a nonprofit, the Unheard Voices Project, dedicated to telling the stories of workers whose livelihoods are endangered by technological change and globalization. Right now we focus on workers in the US--furniture workers, fishermen, and carnival workers--but we hope to expand to other countries in the future.

lender.name: michele
lender.loan_because: I think the microfinancing concept is terrific.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I grew up in Madagascar, and I have seen the value of small businesses first hand.

lender.name: Girl Scout Troop
lender.loan_because: We wanted to reach out to our global community.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Logic Micro Loans
lender.loan_because: We want to connect with people all over the globe.
lender.occupational_info:
We manage money for business owners just like you! We invest their extra profits for the future.
We wish you much success and happiness.

lender.name: Landry Akossehoun
lender.loan_because: Juste pour aider les femmes à se prendre en charge.
lender.occupational_info: Je travaille pour une IMF partenaire de Kiva et je m'occupe du SIG

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: i believe that everyone should be given a change to fullfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: i'm in my last year of high school.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: As a woman, I have owned my own business for 22 years. I want to give women across the globe the same independence.
lender.occupational_info: I own an adoption agency in Indiana and support brave, young women as they place their babies in new loving homes.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to return what others have given to me.

lender.name: Teri Shilling
lender.loan_because: as a former Peace Corps volunteer, I believe in the micro-loan model.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: it's an easy way to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Candidate for Master of Science in Transportation at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.

lender.name: Annie and Carolyn
lender.loan_because: people need help and we have been given so much.
lender.occupational_info: We go to Montessori school.

lender.name: Anjali
lender.loan_because: this gives me an absolutely wonderful opportunity to have a personal connection with the the people around the world and their proposed plan of success. By just making a minimalist contribution towards their life changing success stories, I feel that I am a part of this amazing KIVA effort .Thank you, Kiva

lender.name: Amanda and Uncle David
lender.loan_because: It's fun.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of a hand up not a help out.
lender.occupational_info: I take calculated risks.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: It's fun and fascinating!
lender.occupational_info: I create graphic presentations to help professionals explain complex information, most often for use in trial. I also am a professional illustrator and artist.

lender.name: Clark and Emma
lender.loan_because: There are people in the world who could use our help and who really need the loans. It's also fun.
lender.occupational_info: We are elementary school students who want to help.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Because I want to help make peoples lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure people get their phone books

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: Many people have helped me during my life and now I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Retired ocean research scientist. I enjoy reading, gardening, and traveling. I am particularly interested in how technology can help developing nations.

lender.name: kirk
lender.loan_because: I love to give and help others and I am a businessmen.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, half way through my third year at a university.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: It's my responsibility as a member of the human race to look out for the well being of other people besides myself and my own interest.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: It's so easy, it's a small gesture but I hope it can have a big impact.
lender.occupational_info: I sell conveyor belting (rubber products) to mining companies.

lender.name: Thang
lender.loan_because: Giving back is important and necessary
lender.occupational_info: As a side-business I run an internet art gallery which gives part of its profits back to various charities. Kiva is currently being considered to become one of our main charity recipients.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I feel like I should give back to my local/global community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a librarian in a high school in Massachusetts. I am also in a band called The Beatings.

lender.name: Nadaa
lender.loan_because: Simple - it helps other people and it's fun.
lender.occupational_info: I work on climate change issues.

lender.name: Lejia Lombardi
lender.occupational_info: I get to document how my corporation finances different loans, ranging from construction workers building roads in Haiti to the papusaria stands in El Salvador.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: rachel
lender.loan_because: we lead one precious life

lender.name: Diane
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large Information Technology company designing software that supports customers all over the world

lender.name: Ernest M
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: State level regulation of businesses storing petroleum products

lender.name: Ed and Jo
lender.loan_because: We want to give back to humanity what we have received! We love to travel the world and want to help others who are in need and want to make a difference in their own communities.

lender.name: Miguel A.
lender.loan_because: I love to help others help themselves. "Ask me for fishing lessons before you ask me for a fish."
lender.occupational_info: I assist people and businesses to grow with assistance in marketing and technology.

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: My daughter told me about this, and gave us a gift from Kiva, so we could lend and learn more about it.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a library branch in South Carolina. We encourage all to come and borrow books or learn things, get information and use computers.

lender.name: kimberly
lender.loan_because: microcredit is a wonderful (and proven) method of empowerment, and there is an inexcusable imbalance of wealth in the world right now.
lender.occupational_info: i work for a massage therapy school, as a massage therapist, and as an academic editor.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: "There is no such thing as a "self-made" man. We are made up of thousands of others. Everyone who has ever done a kind deed for us, or spoken one word of encouragement to us, has entered into the make-up of our character and of our thoughts, as well as our success." --George Matthew Adams
lender.occupational_info: i work as little as possible... it cuts WAY into the sunrises, morning drinking coffee on the beach, hiking, snorkeling,kayaking, and boating...

lender.name: nina
lender.loan_because: I want to help adults earn enough money to take care of their children and send them to school.
lender.occupational_info: I am 9 years old and raise chickens for eggs.

lender.name: Julie
lender.occupational_info: I do therapy with 8 children who were abused or neglected and live in foster care. They have emotional and behavioral problems. I visit them in their temporary foster homes and their schools.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: If you teach a man to fish . . .
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are poor and disabled get money to pay their bills.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: for the good of the wellfare; i ask myself now what would the the flash do
lender.occupational_info: spittin game fo the most part

lender.name: Tom Stretches
lender.loan_because: I love to empower others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to become more physically and mentally flexible and to feel stronger and healthier.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: It's only right to help those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I own a private music school in Boulder, Colorado. Teaching music has always been my passion and I firmly believe that to be happy in life, one must follow his heart.

lender.name: Bettina Sawhill
lender.loan_because: I believe in working with individuals and families directly. It's clear that small loans can change the economic outcome of whole communities. Whether doing this in the US or abroad it makes us all better for the commitment.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked for over 30 years in college and university educational administration. When we come together in an educational community the world changes for the better.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I can... and we all benefit only when we help each other out.
lender.occupational_info: I have a corporate job but most importantly I am a mother.

lender.name: Gill
lender.occupation: School Program Interpreter for History San Jose
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I teach school age children to experience history first-hand.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: We can
lender.occupational_info: She keeps people healthy and I am the guy who secures computer networks. The picture is Winston.

lender.name: Katrina and Antonio
lender.loan_because: I want to help people change their lives for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have learning disabilities. I help them in reading and math.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: "The greatest good you can do for another is not just share your riches, but reveal to them their own" - Disraeli

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: Jesus has called all of us to be stewards of our financial resources and help those who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I attend university.

lender.name: Chicken Dan
lender.loan_because: I want my daughters to grow up in an ever improving world and support poultry farmers the world over.

lender.name: mattia
lender.loan_because: why not?
lender.occupational_info: news

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because:
Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime. Plus, it feels good to help!
I love the fact that such a small donation can have a big impact. Makes ya wonder what other small things we can all do to make big change!
lender.occupational_info: I am a 30-year-old student in Colorado I have earned an Associate's in Electronics Technology and am now taking pre-pharmacy classes so I can apply to Pharmacy school in 2015.

lender.name: heather
lender.loan_because: I love ppl and i love God :D

lender.name: Nora
lender.loan_because: I wish to see my fellow brothers and sisters reap the fruits of their labor and realize personal success.

lender.name: Brian & Amy
lender.loan_because: My wife and I enjoy helping people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Software sales and marketing

lender.name: Kahscho
lender.loan_because: Just trying to help.

lender.name: Mariah Lea
lender.loan_because: it's what I can do to help!
lender.occupational_info: I spend most of my time in a biology lab and studying!

lender.name: Preeta
lender.loan_because: I want to help hard-working people across the world find the self-sufficiency and self-worth that will enable them to achieve their life goals.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I'm involved in lots of community service projects here on campus. This March, I'll be traveling to Boston to help people with AIDS, and in August I'll be going to help endangered animals. Kiva is another way for me to help out in the world beyond my own backyard.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: We are all united as human beings in our global community.
lender.occupational_info: I stay home and raise two boys which is a joyful and exhausting privilege!

lender.name: ARCCK
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. Period.
lender.occupational_info:
We are residents of Arkansas and students of communication.
All loans made from this account are made possible through the efforts of college students across Arkansas.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone the ability to make a better life for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the financial transactions of a small business.

lender.name: Russell
lender.occupational_info: I loan because I am a Third World citizen living in the First World. I work for a food and Internet company in the East Coast of the United States.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I have a desire to help others. Sometimes people just need the opportunity and resources to thrive. I would like to give others that opportunity to make their lives better and help them to achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a physical therapist. This is someone who helps people get better and stronger after an injury, or learn how to walk again after a brain injury.

lender.name: Mika
lender.loan_because: I don't want to fund a bloated middle man.
lender.occupational_info: I work with interesting (more or less :-)) PeopleSoft projects.

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupation: Coach and Founder of Break Free Sister
lender.loan_because: it feels good. I deeply honor each person on this site that has a dream. And I feel so blessed to contribute. I chose a group in Pakistan for my first loan after being inspired by the book "Three Cups of Tea".
lender.occupational_info: My passion is for new experiences, adventure, and helping others. I work with people from all over the world to move past their perceived limitations.... to connect, take inspired action, and live out a dream.

lender.name: all in the famliy
lender.loan_because: We believe in Dignity , respect, justice and the value of each individual It may be us in need one day
lender.occupational_info: We teach a strengths based approach to life. We can all make a difference. To see the good in others. To know someone who doesn't know you cares about you

lender.name: Benjamin From Paris
lender.loan_because: I would like to understand how micro-credit could help people through a small but direct link.
lender.occupational_info: Work on computer program to help teaching and learning.

lender.name: PC-Force
lender.loan_because: Why not ?
lender.occupational_info:
Professional Consulting & Development for Internet based Service and Management Applications
CMS Content Management Systems
CRM Customer Relationship Management
ERP Enterprise Resource Planning
SCS Strategic Communication Systems
SaaS Software as a Service

lender.name: Suzette
lender.loan_because: It is my way of doing my part in making the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the real estate industry and my job is very customer based. The largest responsibilty I have is to deal with clients and resolving their problems.

lender.name: Bhaski
lender.loan_because: I like to help people

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I worked in the welfare/government assistance field for 30 years, and met thousands of families who were having a hard time financially, and were trying to get back on their feet. Kiva allows me to help people who want to better themselves and their communities. It's a way for me to give back a little as gratitude for the many blessings I have. It's also an excellent way to teach my grandchildren about helping others.
lender.occupational_info: In the United States, when families experience conditions which make it impossible for them to totally support themselves, the government makes available the means to provide basic food, shelter and clothing, as well as medical care. Also offered are educational and employment opportunities so that the family can become self-sufficient. My job was director of a large agency that administered these aid programs.

lender.name: Oxygen Worldwide s.l.
lender.loan_because: great initiative
lender.occupational_info: we arrange medical oxygen supply for travellers worldwide.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me so much and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in the US Navy.

lender.name: Nicolle
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good knowing that I can help other people.

lender.name: Jeannie
lender.loan_because: I believe in "passing it on". People have helped me, now I can pass it on to someone else who needs the help, to make their life better and happier. Hopefully, someday, everyone in this program will be able to "pass it on" to help someone else.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, and enjoy making a difference.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: A small amount to me could mean a better life for someone less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an Editor in the external communications department of a large European bank.

lender.name: Jayanthi
lender.loan_because: it helps someone out.

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: I know the difficulties of raising a family alone on a tight budget, and would like to help others improve their quality of life through Kiva.

lender.name: james
lender.loan_because: I believe this program really works and helps people who need money progress on their own.
lender.occupational_info: I manage money for people.

lender.name: Lleyton & Langdon
lender.loan_because: We want to help other people by sharing the money God has given to us.

lender.name: Melissa and Clif
lender.loan_because: We enjoy supporting individuals from countries we have visited.
lender.occupational_info: Putting together those with capital with those who need capital and advising companies on purchasing other companies.

lender.name: John & Sandy
lender.loan_because: empowering others to become independent is gratifying.
lender.occupational_info: The lovely thing about art is that it needs no explanation. John is a potter and a woodworker. Sandy is a ceramicist and a multi-media artist.

lender.name: Christianne
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to start their own business so they can support their own family.

lender.name: Brian & Rose Mary
lender.loan_because: We receive back so much more.
lender.occupational_info: worked for an electric power co. for over 42 years.

lender.name: Patrick & Teavy
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to have parents who escaped from the genocide of a third world country. Now its time to give back to those who weren't as fortunate with the opportunity to come to America. -Teavy

lender.name: MarieLynn
lender.loan_because: It makes sense. Entrepreneurs will solve far more of the world's problems than government organizations, and it's my mission to enable entrepreneurs whenever I can wherever I find them.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses, huge and small, set up their online businesses. I integrate technologies like blogs, shopping carts, social networks, etsy, ebay, etc. so you don't have to worry about it (or even understand it!) I take care of it for you and fix it when it's broken, so you can get back to doing what you do best! I also provide technical tools and support for SEO improvements for Canada's most popular magazines such as ELLE Canada and Canadian Living Magazine.

lender.name: T.H.
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Josh & Terri
lender.loan_because: you reap what you sow!

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: i love to help small entrepreneurs to help themselves

lender.name: david montalvo
lender.loan_because: Kiva created an opportunity for me to truly get involved in economically starved countries by directly affecting the businesses and lives there.
lender.occupational_info: Future broadcast journalist currently working on keeping a pulse on green consumer product trends and environmental marketing claims.

lender.name: Jakub
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't you help out someone that needs to get through a tough time
lender.occupational_info: I work in a busy restaurant kitchen in a trendy Montreal restaurant. I work in the evening till late at night. Almost everyone i work with is under 30 which makes the work environment very fast, energetic and open : )

lender.name: Jeniffer
lender.loan_because: it was given to me as a gift and decided to just keep on loaning it.

lender.name: Pablo y Jennifer
lender.whereabouts: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria Las Palmas
lender.loan_because: We think money should never stop anyone from making her/his dreams come true

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: We have so many opportunities to improve our lives here in the US but in smaller countries, opportunities can be very limited and I want to help people who are working to improve their circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an insurance company that provides insurance coverage to large companies.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I have owend my own business and I want to support others who are willing to try to succeed in a business based on their own merit

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I like to know that my contribution helps make such a huge impact on someone's life. Being able to see the good it does just encourages me to do more.
lender.occupational_info: I work in accounting at a mortgage company and recently finished my master's degree. I'm hoping to advance my career so I can do more lending in the future!

lender.name: Kalleen
lender.loan_because: Seeing someone take a modest investment and use it to improve the quality of life for his or her family is inspiring and makes me remember what's truly important.
lender.occupational_info: I love to travel more than anything, and I always learn something from the people I meet along the way...from Europe to China to Thailand. Kiva connects you to people across the world and gives a glimpse into lives you'd never encounter otherwise.

lender.name: Ed Pichler
lender.occupational_info: I sell software and tecnology equipments by internet and to my contacts. I want to make a store pretty soon.

lender.name: Rossana
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. I have been blessed with so much, and giving back is the right thing to do. I want people to be successfull.
lender.occupational_info: I am in customer service, so I help people every day and I like it.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: if i needed a loan, i would want people to help me too.
lender.occupational_info: I work in advertising, but take as much time as i can to travel and see the world, take photos, and write about my trips.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the idea that strangers can help each other improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes to live in.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I love to help others. My account started by a gift for my birthday from a church friend.
lender.occupational_info: I help people feel better about their skin, and help them look better

lender.name: Becki
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference!
lender.occupational_info: see the website below
